categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Asli Krimsan was a plump Humanoid female Jedi Master with black hair who was fond of wearing a burgundy cloak. She lived thousands of years before the Battle of Yavin and trained Jedi for over 200 years. Krimsan later created a holocron. A lecture by Dooku was recorded in this holocron before the Clone Wars.

Darth Vader kept Asli Krimsan's holocron in Bast Castle on Vjun following the Great Jedi Purge. In 22 ABY, it was found by the Jedi historian Tionne Solusar, the Kushiban Master Ikrit, and Jedi trainees Anakin Solo, Tahiri Veila and Uldir Lochett.
